page.title: 13RELIGION
page.content: {Religion}is how people worship God according to their religious beliefs. All Churchmen except the Full Gospel {clergy}have special robes for church. There are two Church of England, one Catholic Church, one Methodist and one Full Gospel in the area. All the Churches celebrate Holy Communion and the main Christian festivals of Christmas, Easter etc., when Church becomes more popular. Every Church gives baptism, weddings and funeral services. Sunday is the main day for services including special services for children. However, weekday services and home services for the sick and elderly are also given. All except Pastor Thomas (Full Gospel) have attended theological college before being ordained. All the churches in use have been built in the last century.
